featured.text: When the Amazons reach the nest of their intended victims, a fierce battle may take place.
He was a victim of racism.
He was a victim of a bad listening habit that he didn’t know he had.

definition.zh_def: 受害者，遭受傷害或不幸的人。
definition.en_def: A person who suffers harm, injury, or loss, often as a result of a crime or accident.
definition.example: The victim of the accident was taken to the hospital.
